question: 吸血鬼
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>demon</kanji> that <kanji>suck</kanji>s <kanji>blood</kanji>? What mythological creature can you think of that sucks blood? How about a <vocabulary>vampire</vocabulary>? Them Sparklzzzz!
sourceReadingMnemonic: <ja>吸血</ja> should be easy for you to read. The <ja>鬼</ja> part uses the reading you already learned with the kanji, <ja>き</ja>. Easy, no?
